definition: of superior grade, the act of choosing or selecting
details:
adjective
- of superior grade
= example: of superior grade
= synonyms: quality
- appealing to refined taste
= example: appealing to refined taste
noun
- the act of choosing or selecting
= example: the act of choosing or selecting
= synonyms: selection
- the person or thing chosen or selected
= synonyms: selection
- one of a number of things from which only one can be chosen
= synonyms: option
